::Zardus/Panzertron::

Zardus walks back to the shuttle that had brought him and Panzertron 
to the Iron Fist, the big major following him. The negotiations were 
complete. The Alliance had full controll of the Iron Fist and its 
resources as long as they defended it when it was under attack.
Zardus 
had all the access codes, and alot of other info about the ship.

Zardus looks back at Panzertron. "Allright," he says, "Send a few 
shuttles later on. We'll move the base here, make an Alliance 
headquarters."

Panzertron nods. "The shuttles will be there," he says as he watches 
Zardus walk into the shuttle, the craft taking off a few seconds 
later.
